item.title: Example Post
item.description: This is the homepage of the Salisuby AI Lab (SAIL)! Let’s try some \( \LaTeX \)! Let \( f(x) = x^2 \). Can we still do nice things with Markdown getting in the way? How about a sequence: \( a_n = a_{n-1} + 2 \). Hopefully this text renders sanely from here on out… but the syntax highlighting in your editor is probably going crazy by now :) Time for some inline: $$ a_n = \begin{cases} 3 \cdot a_n-2 &\text{ if } n > 2 \\
